G

GameEngine - Class in controller
Game Engine class is the starting point of the game where commands are processed and extracted to support the functionalities provided by the commands.
GameEngine() - Constructor for class controller.GameEngine
Game Engine constructor which creates a neutral player when game is started and also initializes LogEntryBuffer which is observable and attaches it to LogWriter.
gamePlayer(String[]) - Method in class controller.GameEngine
function to support adding and removing of players to the game map
getGameMap() - Method in class controller.GameEngine
function to return the current state/situation of the game map
getPhase() - Method in class controller.GameEngine
function to obtain the phase in which we are present in the game
getPlayerOrder() - Method in class controller.GameEngine
function to remove an order from the order queue of the player
getPlayersOrderSize() - Method in class controller.GameEngine
function to get the order size of the player
